name: GPT-5 Search API
description: GPT-5 Search API is a specialized variant that embeds web search functionality directly into AI responses. Released in October 2025, it enables applications to fetch real-time information from the internet, process it intelligently, and deliver cited answers.
notes: Supports three search modes: non-reasoning for quick lookups, agentic search for iterative reasoning, and deep research for exhaustive investigations. Provides cited sources for all information. The evergreen version receives ongoing updates.
